entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
